banner.redesign: Read about the launch of the InReach App redesign on our blog. <Link>Learn more.</Link>

call-out.who-we-are:
<Title1>Who we are</Title1>
<Text>We are a trans-led tech nonprofit increasing resource access for the diverse LGBTQ+ community.</Text>
<Link>Learn more about us.</Link>

hero.heading: منابع LGBTQ+را پیدا کنید.
hero.privacy-disclaimer: پاسخ شما ناشناس است و به عنوان یک کاربر شخصی به شما متصل نیست. برای کسب اطلاعات بیشتر، <Link>سیاست حفظ حریم خصوصی</Link> ما را بخوانید.
hero.subheading: خوش آمدید به اولین پلت فرم فناوری جهان مطابق TLGBQ+ (transgender، لزبین، همجنسگرا، دوجنسگرا، عجیب و غریب و هویت های بیشتر) افرادی که با آزار و اذیت یا تبعیض با منابع امن و تأیید شده روبرو هستند.

values.free:
<Title2>Free forever 🔑</Title2>
<Text>Our tech platform is 100% free for everyone to ensure safe help is always InReach.</Text>
<LinkFree>Donate to help us to keep our platform free.</LinkFree>
values.innovative:
<Title2>Innovative ✨</Title2>
<Text>We are the world’s first tech platform matching LGBTQ+ people facing persecution or discrimination with safe, independently verified resources.</Text>
<LinkInnovative>View our source code and contribute.</LinkInnovative>
values.intersectional:
<Title2>Intersectional ✊🏿‍✊🏾✊🏽</Title2>
<Text>We believe LGBTQ+ equality requires trans justice, refugee justice, racial justice, reproductive justice, language justice and more.</Text>
<LinkIntersect>Learn more about our vetting process.</LinkIntersect>
values.safety-first:
<Title2>Safety-first 🔒</Title2>
<Text>We know online anonymity can be a life-or-death issue for LGBTQ+ people. That's why our App is designed to protect users' confidentiality and safety online.</Text>
<LinkSafety>Learn more about our privacy policy.</LinkSafety>
